document_data.name: Ilandra Wavemistress
document_data.mainbody: '''Ilandra Wavemistress''' was a [[half-elf|half–]][[aquatic elf]] pirate on the [[Moonsea]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Ilandra was a woman with deeply tanned skin and long, greenish-black hair. She usually dressed in a sea-green [[tunic]], with [[leggings]] of the same color, and a [[cape]] colored deep aqua.
document_data.Personality: Ilandra was a charismatic leader and a good sailor. She hated [[Hillsfar]] for its racist policies and always harassed ships of that city.
document_data.History: Ilandra was bullied and driven out of Hillsfar for her half-elven heritage, and so she gathered some like-minded people and decided to go into piracy in order to get revenge on the societies that spited them. She become a very good pirate. Her ship was the ''[[Mingledblood]]''.
